Varoutas Dimitris Varoutas Associate Professor, Department of Informatics and Telecommunications School of Sciences National and Kapodistrian University of Athens Head of the MINT  Management and Economics of Innovation in Telecom Industries Group Director, Cultural Technologies Laboratory, cultech.di.uoa.gr Contact details E-mail: D.Varoutas di . uoa . gr    (Or use the arkas di . uoa . gr ) Tel: +30 - 210-727-5318, Fax: +30 - 210-727-5214 Address (Postal and Courier): Department of Informatics and Telecommunications, National and Kapodistrian University of Athens, Panepistimiopolis, Ilisia, Athens,  GR-15784 GREECE. Visiting Address: Room B-18, Department of Informatics and Telecommunications, Panepistimiopolis (University Campus), Athens. Areas of Interest: Telecommunications Technoeconomics, Telecommunications Systems Engineering, Optical Communications and Networking, Wireless Communications and Networking, Telecommunications Engineering Economics, Industrial Organisation and Regulatory Economics, Demand and Price Forecasting.
